mapper.select: select * from loudsourcingentry WHERE loudsourcing_no=#{loudsourcing_no} ORDER BY title LIMIT #{start_index}, #{end_index}
select * from loudsourcingentry WHERE loudsourcing_no=#{loudsourcing_no} ORDER BY fan_number DESC LIMIT #{start_index}, #{end_index}
select * from loudsourcingentry WHERE loudsourcing_no=#{loudsourcing_no} ORDER BY reg_date DESC LIMIT #{start_index}, #{end_index}
select * from loudsourcingentry WHERE artist_no=#{artist_no} AND loudsourcing_no=#{loudsourcing_no}
mapper.insert: insert into loudsourcingentry(loudsourcing_no, artist_no, title, file, content, reg_date, revise_date, agree, thumbnail, artist_name, artist_profile_img, fan_number) VALUES (#{loudsourcing_no}, #{artist_no}, #{title}, #{file}, #{content}, #{reg_date}, #{revise_date}, #{agree}, #{thumbnail}, #{artist_name}, #{artist_profile_img}, #{fan_number})
mapper.update: update loudsourcingentry SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, revise_date=#{revise_date}, artist_name=#{artist_name}, artist_profile_img=#{artist_profile_img} WHERE entry_no=#{entry_no}
update loudsourcingentry SET vote_number=#{vote_number} WHERE entry_no=#{entry_no}
update loudsourcingentry SET visit=#{visit} WHERE entry_no=#{entry_no}
update loudsourcingentry SET fan_number=#{fan_number} WHERE entry_no=#{entry_no}
update loudsourcingentry SET comment_number=#{comment_number} WHERE entry_no=#{entry_no}
